entry.summary: 1Hive recently received an Aragon Nest grant to build Dandelion Orgs. What are Dandelion Orgs you might ask? Dandelion Orgs are a suite of Aragon apps that, when combined, create an Aragon DAO that is functionally similar to MolochDAO. Unlike MolochD...
